objects.specification: A robust square exhibition platform with a brushed metallic surface in gunmetal gray, sized to comfortably fit a demo car and provide space around for visitor flow. The edges are subtly chamfered for a refined appearance, evoking modern showroom standards.

A smooth matte white fair booth wall panel with subtle metallic trim and a minimalist design in a clean automotive-themed style, providing a sturdy vertical backdrop. The front panel has a large central opening serving as the entrance, while side and rear panels are continuous to form a cohesive enclosure.

The front panel has a large central opening serving as the entrance, while side and rear panels are continuous to form a cohesive enclosure.

The front panel has a large central opening serving as the entrance, while side and rear panels are continuous to form a cohesive enclosure.

A high-detail demo car model with sleek aerodynamic body accented in glossy red paint, black alloy wheels, tinted windows, and subtle chrome trim. The design is modern and dynamic, emphasizing performance and style in an automotive exhibition context.

A contemporary registration desk with a low-profile rectangular form, featuring a matte black finish with subtle metallic accents, and a smooth white countertop. The design is ergonomic and inviting, optimized for visitor interaction and branding.

A freestanding display panel with a slim profile, featuring a tall rectangular format with a glossy white frame and a matte black display surface designed to showcase high-resolution car images and specification graphics. The style is minimal and elegant, consistent with the automotive theme.

A sleek hanging spotlight fixture with polished chrome housing and a focused LED emitter, designed to cast a bright, cool-toned beam directly onto the displayed car and panels. The cable is minimal and finishes seamlessly into the ceiling architecture.

A modern visitor chair with a minimalist form, featuring a black powder-coated metal frame, comfortable white upholstered seat and backrest, and slender legs for an unobtrusive footprint.

A small round visitor table with a glossy white tabletop, slender black metal pedestal base, and precise proportions for casual seating interactions.
A glossy floor decal resembling a premium car showroom surface with subtle geometric patterns in metallic gray and white, providing visual depth and brand cohesion.
